      • Game

        public Game(int gameLevel,
            int maxNumberOfPlayers,
            boolean bossModeActive,
            int maxScore)
        Makes a new instance of the class Game
        Parameters:
        gameLevel - Level of the game to start with
        maxNumberOfPlayers - Max number of players able to join
        bossModeActive - Should boss mode be activated on start?
        maxScore - Max score reachable

      • generateSpawn

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 generateSpawn(Entity entity)
                                            throws NoValidSpawnException
        Generates spawnvectors for every entity in the game that needs to be spawned. This includes players (both human and AI), bullets, pickups and all not-moving entities.
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to generate a spawn point for
        Returns:
        the spawnvector for the selected entity
        Throws:
        NoValidSpawnException - Thrown when no valid spawn position has been found

      • angle

        public int angle(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 beginVector,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 endVector)
        Calculates the angle between two vectors
        Parameters:
        beginVector - : The vector that will be used as center
        endVector - : Where the object has to point to
        Returns:
        Returns the angle, this will be between 0 and 360 degrees

      • calculateNewPosition

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 calculateNewPosition(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 currentPosition,
                                                          com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 EndPosition,
                                                          double speed)
        Calculates the new position between the currentPosition to the Endposition.
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - : The current position of the object
        EndPosition - : The position of the end point
        speed - : The speed that the object can move with
        Returns:
        the new position that has been calculated

      • calculateNewPosition

                                                          double speed,
                                                          double angle)
        Calculates the new position from a beginposition and a angle..
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - : The current position of the object
        speed - : The speed that the object can move with
        angle - : The angle of where the object should be heading
        Returns:
        the new position that has been calculated
